hive

Class Bee

  • java.lang.Object
    • hive.Bee
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BeehiveInterface, SourceInterface, java.lang.Runnable

    public class Bee
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, SourceInterface, BeehiveInterface
    The bee - lots of information is stored here. Each bee object is meant to be run as single thread, as there are lots of actions, interactions, decisions and death (not implemented yet).
    Author:
    ole
